text: Horacio Gonz치lez Fontova (30 October 1946 - 20 April 2020) was an Argentine actor, singer-songwriter and comedian. He was born in Buenos Aires. He was known for his roles in The Plague (1992), Aballay (2011) and Underdogs (2013). He appeared in the Argentine historical television series Algo habr치n hecho por la historia argentina.
